name: Sleepwalker (itch) (Kai)
description:
Short horror/suspense game where you have to find and collect candles, and escape.

Controls:

  • CTRL = Crouch
  • WASD = Walk
  • E = Interact
  • SHIFT = Sprint
  • ESC = Quit

Warnings:

  • Game contains jumpscares and loud noises.
  • Game could perform bad on lower end devices.

Known Bugs:

  • None
